feed.title: Category: rabl | Tommy Chan's software blog (@tommytcchan)

entry.title: wrong number of arguments (1 for 0)
entry.content:
So I've started getting the following error message when I started a json service that reads a model which is fog enabled (with s3): wrong number of arguments (1 for 0) at messages.json.rabl where line #1 raised: I wasn't getting this before, so what gives?

Solution:

It turned out that I was doing this to get the asset path:

model.asset

However, that only returns the AssetUploader instance, so when it tried to render it, it gave me the error. If you want just the path to s3, you will need the to_s appended to the end.
